website_summaries.verdict: This comfortable carrier is a great choice for slimmer, commuter-style bikes.
pros: Designed for children 9 months to 3 years, and up to 33 pounds
cons: Not a good fit for mountain bikes
Cyclists of 5 feet 10 inches and taller are likely to hit their knees

customer_reviews.title: Great seat but not for thicker mountain bike frames
customer_reviews.text: I've now got one happy 2 year old at home who asks to go bike riding non-stop! Its super fun to have him right in front of me demanding we go this way and that way and FASTER! My only complaint with this seat is that I had to buy a different bike as it just didn't work on my mountain bike due to its frame being too thick to allow me to turn with the seat attached. Definitely recommend this seat though.
customer_reviews.author: N. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got the Thule after looking at a ton of front mount and rear mount bike seats because we thought it had great safety features, good ventilation (our little one runs hot) and we thought he'd like the view from the front rather than looking at our backs. Cooper loves this seat! He has a blast during bike rides, especially the downhills. The little bar for him to hold in the front is great and I think it helps him feel in control. His legs aren't long enough to put in the leg straps but he's not going anywhere once the harness is buckled. Safe, secure and fun for our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter could not be happier with this seat. She’s 21 months old and this has lots of room for her to grow and for it to still work. By the time she’s over the weight limit I’m sure she’ll want her own bike. It is only slightly awkward the first time you ride with the seat as it’s a slight adjustment for your legs to spread a little and not hit it while pedaling.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary G

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: I did a LOT of searching trying to decide which front-mount seat to get for my bike and I’m so glad I went with this one. The high back gives my 17 month old support and she seemed comfortable. We took her out for her first ride in it yesterday and the only reason we stopped was because her helmet had started to bother her (first time really wearing it). I’m only 5’3” and didn’t have any problems seeing over her as I rode. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best Bike Seat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with the Thule Yepp Mini child bike seat. It's well worth the price, considering it can accommodate up to a 35lb child. Easy install - took about 20 minutes with no special tools needed. The foot straps and three point harness straps are adjustable. We were gifted a different child bike seat that was not compatible with my Linus Dutchi bike and decided to splurge on this one. My 16 month old son absolutely loved his first ride and we are looking forward to many more.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa G

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware and tools
customer_reviews.text: Item did not come with hardware (two screws) required to assemble foot holders to seat. Item did not come with tool (oversized Allen wrench) required to assemble mount on the bike. We have to go the hardware store to buy items.
customer_reviews.author: kklipp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: For reference my son is 19 months and weighs 26 pounds and he's about 32 inches tall. Anyways after about a couple causal rides to the park with my husband, the leg handle that attaches to the seat CHIPPED OFF!! & no it can’t be fixed. So no this item is not sturdy, and its certainly not worth almost $200. Love the concept, but the quality is HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Abdihakim Hashi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We used this bike seat all summer and I couldn’t be happier. Our little man was about a year old when we were using it and he loved it. The seat is very secure and your little boy or girl gets to see everything in front of them, unlike other seats where they are behind you.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this thing and couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s first birthday. We LOVE this thing and couldn’t be happier. It was light enough we flew it to Florida with us and used the includes adaptor to quickly mount onto rental bikes. Would buy again, and probably will now that we have another on the way :)
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quail

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great
customer_reviews.text: This seat is so awesome. We are still using it and my little one is 4 (although on the small size) and I think he will fit well for a few more months. I’ve gotten a good two years out of it and that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Momma O

customer_reviews.title: Love this Yepp Mini Bicycle Seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this child seat. We also have the Wee Ride. The Wee Ride fits my husbands bike but it would not fit my Electra Townie. This child seat is perfect for my Electra Townie! My daughter loves riding with me! It was not hard at all to adjust to the seat and I love how easy it is to take it on and off the bike! It is in great shape and looks as nice as the day I bought it! It's so nice to have my daughter so close to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The actual seat is very nice! But it's extremely uncomfortable to ride with on my bike. I'm 5' 10" and my knees pound into this with every peddle. I've tried a million different adjustments on my bike to try to make it more comfortable so that my knees don't hit it, but nothing works. I end up peddling oddly, with my knees flared out. No way I can ride for very long like this. It's super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: EmMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is great and our son loves getting to ride with his Daddy! Had to give 3 stars for ease of install just because we’re not handy at all and took it to a bike shop to be installed. But once the hardware is installed, the seat just clicks right into place. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R Powers

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 9 month old (for reference he weighs 19lbs and is 28 inches long). The seat is comfortable, sturdy and it didn’t interfere with the ability to maneuver the bike. It was super easy to install also! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike seat!
customer_reviews.text: This seat fits our 7 month old baby perfectly. It's easy to install and I love how my baby sits right in front of me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rivera

customer_reviews.title: My little one loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The Pros: The seat seems comfortable (no complaints from my little one), it COMES WITH the mounting bracket, and the construction of the seat seems great. The best part, my little one loves it (I actually added a bell to the handle bar for her). The Cons: If you are not comfortable with turning a wretch, instillation may be a little difficult. It did limit the turning radius on my bike, but not inconveniently so. In short, if you want to take your little one on a bike ride, and they cannot fit on a back mounted seat, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bike seat for our pedego
customer_reviews.text: I put this on our Pedego and our 8 month old absolutely loves it. As soon as we start going he grabs on to his little handle bars and squeals with delight. Easy to use and put on. I can't wait to use this all summer. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: recieved yesterday and I was totally disappointed when I installed on my $3000 Trek and found ...
customer_reviews.text: I researched lots of products and viewed tons on Video's on YOUTUBE ... recieved yesterday and I was totally disappointed when I installed on my $3000 Trek and found out it is not compatible because of the bike design... Amazon was very understanding and they were prepared to give full refund and free return shipping... I researched plan B ... buy a bike that is compatible to the yepp mini... got a Aerostream Gt mountain cruiser... knees don't hit and very comfortable for my daughter and myself... bottom line have the right bike.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat for toddlers. My two year old grandson loved riding in this seat. He would not stop bugging us to go for a ride when he saw the seat. I had to take it off and put the seat where he could not see it. What's great is it comes off easily, it is very well made, and it come with the tools you need to assemble and install. It's a Dutch product, and they are all about riding bikes
customer_reviews.author: BobCat’s wife

customer_reviews.title: Great seat but came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Great seat how ever it came without the two screws that it need. We had to go to the hardware store to find some that fitted
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: The most optimized design!
customer_reviews.text: I am riding a mountain bike and I was looking for a child seat. Since my bike is a rear suspension one, I couldn’t attach the rear seat. I was almost convinced that I had to get a new bike until I saw this one. It is simple, secure, comfortable and yet functional design and I think LOs would love the ride since they are in front. Overall a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Puts the child in a secure place on the bike.
customer_reviews.text: Installs easy for the most part. Had a little trouble getting one of the bolts to line up. But it’s a nice item. Kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: The Antic

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Excellent child seat. Top quality and safe. Nicely opened up the opportunity for family bike rides; two year old daughter loves it and is feels comfortable and safe (talking and singing all the way). Make sure to include an adapter with your order right away if you have a mountain- or hybrid bike with a non-quill type steel stem or Ahead system.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes A. M. Lomans

customer_reviews.title: does not impede safety of child riding the bike
customer_reviews.text: granddaughter loves riding with her American Girl doll along with her
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Safe and well made
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy ride for the baby. Locks well into place.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this well designed bike seat!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is awesome! it is very easy to take on and off the bike. The handle bar adapter doesn't quite fit my bike but I was able to screw it tight enough (with a little gap left between the two parts) to be safe to ride. The picture shows our ten month old first ride, he LOVED it! At first, I was a little scared to be off balance but there isn't much difference between riding with or without the seat. I like that he feels secure with our arms surrounding him. I highly recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia M Roy

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases yet..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go on our bikes.. was deciding between this and a seat that goes on the back. So pleased I chose this one. My one year old loves it. He has the best view and it’s not in my way at all.. one of my most favorite purchases yet. Worth every penny...
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. Very easy to install. My kid is almost 1yrs old at 22lbs. Not sure how long this will last but cruiser bike feels very secure with her in the front. She loves it and it looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bike seat!
customer_reviews.text: This seat has been amazing to us! Fits perfectly on the front of my Yuba Mundo. Very comfortable for my son and easy to steer around. Sadly this will be our last summer with it as I expect him to outgrow it but that just means we will get to test out the Yepp Maxi next! I've loved having him up front where I can see and interact with him during our rides.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect child carrier.
customer_reviews.text: This seat fits my Townie perfectly. My daughter loves sitting up front and it's easy to use and very secure. It seems to be very well made. It easy to install and easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase to date
customer_reviews.text: We starting using this for our daughter when she was about eight months and it is so fabulous! She is now almost and year and still loves to ride with us. My husband had no issues installing. It is a little difficult to peddle with but nothing he can not handle. Best baby purchase to date! It is so nice to be able to ride again....with baby in tow.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Yepp Mini Bike Seat
customer_reviews.text: Seat was purchased for a 15 month old grandson to ride on my Trek Navigator with me. Chose this model so he wouldn't be staring at my back as we rode. Works great in that respect. Also allows me to check on him as we ride. I have to mount and dismount the bicycle by legging over the rear tire to the saddle. Sometimes a bit awkward. Overall, I would recommend this seat. Construction quality good and easy to install. Moreover, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for you and your baby!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this bike seat on my pretty standard commuter style bike and it mounted just fine! It’s a little tight as I peddle but not bad, we have been on many 15 or 20 mile bike ride so far and we all love it. I can talk to my child as we ride and they have a front row seat, it’s very fun. I would highly recommend this seat, it feels very safe to ride with them in your arms.
customer_reviews.author: Nidal I.

customer_reviews.title: Electra Townie compatible
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my wife’s Electra Townie and did not need an adaptor to connect. 9 month old baby girl loves it. Left and right turning radius are about 45 degrees, right on the threshold.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times
customer_reviews.text: My daughter began riding in this when she was 7 months old and is still using it at 22 months, although she will soon be too big for it (she is in the 80% for her height though).
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Founds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My kid is 18m old 22lbs. Fits great. Got this after living in EU and realizing the EU bikers know whats up. Since they ride more than drive.
customer_reviews.author: B P

customer_reviews.title: best bike seat ever
customer_reviews.text: Ahh! This thing is awesome! My little girl is 15 mo and she loves this seat. I am 5'10", and the seat is not too uncomfortable to ride with even with long legs. You do ride with your knees slightly outward with this on. But it's nothing too noticeable, if it means you can ride your bike with the baby on the front. You can talk to your child, point at things, and she gets the breeze in her hair. She comes up to me every day with her helmet and talks about the bicycle. Very happy with the quality, was easy to install, easy to clean. Just be prepared to have your kid ringing the bike bell constantly.
customer_reviews.author: babybelle

customer_reviews.title: more tedious set up and take off Less comfortable, more weight in a poorer distribution
customer_reviews.text: Child doesn't seem comfortable in this seat. He was very happy in the iBert, though.
customer_reviews.author: home mon cheri

customer_reviews.title: This bike seat is amazing! My son loves riding in this seat and ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike seat is amazing! My son loves riding in this seat and "driving" mommy all around the island.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits very good even for a threadless.. using a bike from specialized.. looks solid and trusty
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler purchase we've made!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is amazing! My daughter LOVES it and I love the freedom it gives us. We ride everyday! She is 15 months old and "asks" to go for rides! It is comfortable for her and me, it is secure, it's streamline and visually appealing. It's the best toddler purchase we've made!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this seat, and so does my daughter. It's easy to install and very easy to take on and off, which I do all the time. It's comfortable and not bulky, and doesn't affect my riding at all. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Conway

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bicycle seat! He started riding in it with his dad when he was 5-6 months old. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Child Seat
customer_reviews.text: Great child seat. Mounts on front so child can see everything. My granddaughter is ready to go bike riding every day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seat, but didn't work for turning
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful seat, but with my bike it inhibited turning (I could only turn part way before the leg bumped the center bar on the bike frame), so I had to return it. For a different bike, I think it would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Pelagos

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.  A little windy the first time, but he got used to it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves to go on bike rides in this. He's kind of little, but 2 years old and still fits. Hope he can still use it next summer.
customer_reviews.author: gramma sue

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this seat! I wish I had purchased it earlier. She still las lots of room to grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. Got this only took minutes to put on the bike. So easy to get my son in and out that even if we only have 15 minutes for a ride we go!!!! Took him out twice the first day. Absolutely 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: judith Mihalkovitz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. Great that you can remove it with one hand. Very sad that's son is too heavy for it now and has to move to the back. Nice cause yours close to the child, so it's easy to talk to and hear, also it feels very safe, as you'd kind of hugging the child and just in case you would fall, you get the extra protection from the handlebars and the parents body. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Monica RS Muller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The best feature of this seat is that it is easy to add/remove when you want to use your bike without a child. Also, the material never gets too hot -- despite sitting out in the sun for several hours of the day.
customer_reviews.author: AN R.

customer_reviews.title: Yup on the Yepp!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat for an interactive ride with your little one. You'll never miss another "oooh" or "aaah". Sturdy, safe, comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Gal

customer_reviews.title: My toddler enjoy riding with us in her Yepp seat
customer_reviews.text: My toddler enjoy riding with us in her Yepp seat. The only draw back is it makes riding awkward because your knees need to turn outward.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this! Fits my 7 month old good and as she gets older will fit her even better! Not bulky at all and simply and sleek
customer_reviews.author: Courtney H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love that my baby can be in front and close to me while riding. The install was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Love it and my 14 mo old daughter loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it and my 14 mo old daughter loves it too. I installed it on my cruiser and it fit perfectly. I will need to buy the other adapter to install on my mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: WE love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our son is 7 months old and he loves bike rides. It is pretty safe and easy to put it together. I wish I can upload a picture so you could see it. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat and our baby does too! I'm a tall woman - 5'9" - and I didn't have any problems with my knees hitting the bottom of the seat like some other reviewers have had. My husband is 5'6" and felt comfortable riding the bike with the seat as well. Our son seems comfortable and enjoys the view. It was also easy to assemble and very easy to take on and off the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!! My daughter loves her view and loves ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! My daughter loves her view and loves going for rides!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Sicam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it did not fit my 3-year old
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon

customer_reviews.title: Great. Bike ride weekend down the toilet
customer_reviews.text: Missing hardware from the factory. Great. Bike ride weekend down the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several other options and this one seemed the most solid and most professional of them all. It did not disappoint. It is extremely well designed and manufactured. It's expensive as hell, but it's worth it. Make sure the handlebar fork of your bike is round and thin; I have three bikes and this seat fits only on one of them. You'll need approx. 2 in. of vertical and the horizontal diameter should not be more than approx. 1 in. If you don't have this, then you'll have to buy an adapter and that costs another $27, making this one expensive child seat...
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Wife being from Holland...Loves it on her dutch bike.
customer_reviews.text: it fits our little one perfectly and adjusts to accommodate slightly larger. one more year and he will get his own balance bike.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McClarin

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best!
customer_reviews.text: Built well, excellent fit, easy to use, and comfortable for the child.
customer_reviews.author: C D

customer_reviews.title: Best bike seat ever...
customer_reviews.text: The best bike seat known to man...people oh and awe whenever we are out, and my little pal loves it. But alas, he's growing, and our days are numbered! B
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for petite toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad this didn't work out for us. Looks great and the idea behind this seat is wonderful. However, my 18 month old is petite for her age (> 20 lbs and approx. 26" tall) and the straps just couldn't be adjusted tight enough to keep her in. She could easily slip her arms out of the harness and her feet weren't long enough to be strapped in, even with the footrests on the highest setting. I don't feel comfortable trying to "hack" the product to make her fit better, so I'm returning. Great concept. Just not great for petite toddlers. :(
customer_reviews.author: MomOfOne

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This seat fits my wife's Trek bike with no problems at all. It works well, just as advertised and my daughter loves riding up front. It's very secure, and can also be removed very easily. The only con to it is the steering radius. Once this seat is installed, you won't be able to turn as well. Other than that, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Howard

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't fall asleep in this one like he does in the one that we have on ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this! He says, "Go, Momma, go" when I pull into the driveway. He doesn't fall asleep in this one like he does in the one that we have on the back of his dad's bike but he loves it. He loves that he can grab the handlebars and pretend that he's steering. My knees don't hit the seat and I don't have to ride with my legs at an odd angle. This is also the only seat I have found that fits the type of cruiser I have - a Townie Electra. I almost sold my bike until I found this seat!
customer_reviews.author: ACM71

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best product for this kind for sure, just wish the sit was taller to rest the head. Colors and quality are great. Very durable and safe
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Bator

customer_reviews.title: Good product but returned due to not fitting bike
customer_reviews.text: Good product but returned due to not fitting bike, and would be to crowded to ride if got extra piece to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and love having my daughter sit in ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and love having my daughter sit in front of me. The design is great except the straps would fall off my squirmy two year olds shoulders requiring me to tie the top together with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this! We ride every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: So happy to discover this bike seat and will gladly promote ...
customer_reviews.text: So happy to discover this bike seat and will gladly promote it with this review. Yepp's mini bicycle seat is easy to mount and perfectly puts baby in the front of the bike for optimal views of the ride. Our little one especially appreciates the handle and casually tries to "steer" the bike himself : ) The straps are comfortable and the foot rests glide up and down to fit baby's reach. The entire seat is made of a wipeable soft (but firm) material.
customer_reviews.author: Raquintyre

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for! Our 10 month ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! Our 10 month old fits securely and loves the view up front. Just had to raise the handlebars if the cruiser up two inches to accommodate the mount.
customer_reviews.author: K D'Auria

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy frame, comfortable flexible seat, easy to assemble, beautiful engineering. So happy to get the baby started on the bike earlier than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this. My 11 month old loves to ride on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Katelin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Attached it to my beach cruiser and love it. Started taking my 7 month old for rides around town and he loves it. Looking forward to getting a lot of use out of it
customer_reviews.author: sarah v dehaan

customer_reviews.title: best bike seat
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful bike seat!!! You can see your child while you are riding the bike and insure they are safe. Also you can share the bike ride experience with them. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Remington T White

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Missing the the two bolts that attach the leg pieces and arm piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Clements

customer_reviews.title: Missing and broken hardware
customer_reviews.text: I bought knowing the packaging was destroyed but it stated that it was still brand new condition. I am missing two bolts, I see a small plastic bag that I’m assuming once held the bolts but it was open and there was nothing inside or the box. Not to mention the connector piece doesn’t even stay in place it just continually pops back out. Don’t even know how I’ll get this to work. So disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! My daughter fits in it great and it's super comfortable. No issues with visibility either.
customer_reviews.author: ASJ

customer_reviews.title: but it's easy to remove the seat from the base clip when ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple and the seat fits many bike types. My child loves sitting where he can see everything and he is well-supported. There is a small limit on turning because of the foot rests which only affects very slow speeds and tight quarters, but it's easy to remove the seat from the base clip when you don't have your child and it has a locking mechanism so it won't get stolen. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KanakaLele

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike seat for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike seat for my baby! I can enjoy the ride with her instead of her looking at my back!
customer_reviews.author: emilyappleseed

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Solid construction and materials. I'm very happy with the product, even it is a bit expensive. My daughter (used from 9 months old) is very happy when she is in it, which is a huge plus. The only downside is that depending on the bike, it can obstruct the leg when pedaling or limit the turning range. Do not be afraid of over-tightening the connector. It needs to be VERY secure so that the seat does not slip.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyWideITSupport

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this seat!
customer_reviews.text: We got this seat for my little boy who was 18 months at the time. He loved being in the front and seeing all the action. He would try to climb up into the seat even when we weren't planning a ride. He never fussed about getting strapped in and putting on his riding gear. My husband loved it, too. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Julie T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our granddaughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I recommend this seat to any mom/dad with ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I recommend this seat to any mom/dad with a young one. We love to be outdoors and this is exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: allison miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the ibert. My 1 year old couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Theonie D. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Front-Mounted Seat
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research into front-mounted child seats before I decided on the Yepp Mini. Absolutely thrilled with the seat. Installation was quick and easy. Great that the seat can be locked onto the adapter or removed quickly for storage or solo riding. Our daughter (2 yo) loves going for rides because she has a great view and can feel the breeze on her face. We also have the benefit of being able to interact with and keep an eye on her. I have only one minor complaint: Having to buy the separate threadless handlebar adapter. I understand that most North American bikes have the threadless stems. Would be nice if this was standard adapter with the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Harms

customer_reviews.title: great seat
customer_reviews.text: This yepp mini seat is awsome. gives your kid a upfront veiw. Works great on my beach crusier. The only negative is the weight limit, 33 pounds .
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, my 10 month old daughter loves it! Seems to be comfortable for her
customer_reviews.author: Dana McNorton

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: Saw these everywhere in Amsterdam. Had to have one. They're a bit overpriced but its great for cruising around with my son.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, super fun/easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We love this bikeseat! We love having our sun in the seat and riding right in front where we can hear him and point things out etc. The seat is very, very well made, well designed, and works very well. It's super easy to install, and also easy to put on and off each time with the quick release mechanism, but it's also nice that you can lock it on. Would definitely buy again. We considered the ibert, but are very glad we paid the extra money to get the Yepp.
customer_reviews.author: Graves Neck

customer_reviews.title: very nice seat
customer_reviews.text: my son loved this seat, so confortable and safety we used this seat and never have a problem take care
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Altamirano Bastias

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I love the versatility to transfer from my bike to my wife's bike an being able to watch him
customer_reviews.author: jason hunter

customer_reviews.title: BEST and MOST FUN ride for my 2y old.
customer_reviews.text: The Yepp Mini is and does exactly what the manufacturer advertises: Light, easy to install, safe, comfortable (for both my son and me), no loss of control over handle bar, and a lot of fun for my son as he has first hand view of everything. We just love our Yepp Mini! I highly recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Soto

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I knew my little guy would love this...and he does. I didn't want to put him behind me or at ground level. I feel more in control and better balanced with him right up front with me. I'm 5'1" and am able to see and function perfectly. People always comment on how cool it is and I totally agree!
customer_reviews.author: B. Amos

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Seriously, if you're in the fence just do it. Now I can take her with me on my rides! (FYI she hated a trailer)
customer_reviews.author: Travis W.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews online but I am so happy with this product that I felt I needed to share. I purchased it as a Father's Day gift for my husband and now he and our 9-month-old enjoy bike rides daily. It's lightweight but sturdy, and we were able to set it up quickly and easily. It fits our Elektra beach cruiser perfectly with no adapter or additional parts needed. I can't speak for how well it bodes with more serious cyclists, but if you're in the market for a safe and good looking infant bike seat for leisure cruises, I highly recommend this product. I just wish Yepp made infant helmets to match!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful baby seat!  Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Super wonderful! Did a ton of research and decided on this child seat. Everything about it is good: the back is high enough to provide support, the straps are easy to work, the double safety clips are a great idea. Baby loves the little handle, too! Went on our beach cruiser easily and is very, very easy to ride. We don't seem to have any issues bumping our knees on it (like we have seen on some reviews of other seats). Also, has a quick-detachment feature that means the seat just comes right off if you don't want it. Plus, the seat locks ON if you want to prevent theft. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: garden321

customer_reviews.title: There is not a cooler bike seat out there
customer_reviews.text: This bike seat is a miracle of engineering. It fit my wife's bike perfectly and is really easy to install. Every time we go out and ride in our neighborhood or on a trail, we get constant compliments. We've almost caused a few car accidents because people driving by just stare and forget to watch the road. The seat looks good, seems comfortable, and is very sturdy. There is absolutely no wobble when you ride, and the 5-point harness keeps our son positioned well. The first time we rode in this seat our son fell asleep and slumped onto the handle in front - which turned out to be a nice head rest! Great seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

product_meta.title: Thule Yepp Mini Child Bike Seat
product_meta.description: Get outside and stay active as a family with the Thule Yepp Mini child bike seat. Safe and easy to use, this lightweight front-mounted kids bike seat allows you to ride as a family on daily commutes or longer biking adventures. Designed with an adjustable 5-point safety harness, a childproof buckle and a shock absorbing seat, your little co-pilot is will stay safe, secure and comfortable on any bike ride. This baby bike seat is built with water-repellent material that is easy to keep clean. Adjustable foot rests and straps grow with your child, making it the ideal bike carrier for kids from 9 months - 3 years.
feature_bullets: Safe and comfortable front child bike seat for daily commutes and family biking adventures
Easy bike mounting; compatible with most bike models
Soft and shock-absorbing seat for child comfort
Adjustable, padded 5-point harness ensures child safety and the perfect fit
Adjustable foot rests and straps grow with your child
Water-repellent material is easy to clean
Weight capacity: 33 pounds (Designed and tested for children 9 months - 3 years old)
Consult with a pediatrician for children under 1 year old
